Reversi and Diamond Dash

by Daniel Bienvenu

Released Jan 1, 2004
Players 1
License Unknown

Download ROM

Description

Reversi - Based on the classic board game where your objective is to capture the most pieces on the game board by flipping discs to your color; Diamond Dash - Dig through five mountains with a limited supply of dynamite, collecting all the diamonds as fast as you can! Do you have the skill to make it through all five mountains?
